tree.name: Acer monspessulanum
tree.shapeandstructure: Spherical crown. Straight main trunk with branches. Drooping foliage
tree.springcolor: Bright green upper side, whitish green underside

tree.name: Olea europea
tree.shapeandstructure: Irregular crown. Irregular main trunk with bifurcations..

tree.name: Ramaje tortuoso
tree.springcolor: Dark green upper side, silvery green underside

tree.name: Platanus orientalis
tree.shapeandstructure: Ovoid crown. Straight main trunk. Expansive branching.
tree.springcolor: Medium green upper side, light green underside

tree.name: Quercus ilex
tree.shapeandstructure: Spherical or irregularly elliptical crown. Straight main trunk. Twisted branches
tree.springcolor: Silvery in young leaves. In mature leaves, dark green upper side, silvery underside
